title: Epic Modded - Dragon Age: Origins - Promo Item Update
description:
Howdy bay peoples,

Just presenting a quick update for my Epic Modded version of Dragon Age: Origins.
It adds all promo items that I somehow forgot to include..

Also fixes a bug with one of the mage robes not appearing as they should.
Installation Instructions & list of promo items included, of course.

It's a fairly small file, so the it should be quickly downloaded.

Much greetings & enjoy,
ExtremeModder
